data.name: Name (optional, used as name prefix for all devices)

link.title: Link Access point
link.description:
Press the blue button on the access point and the submit button to register HomematicIP with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on bridge](/static/images/config_flows/config_homematicip_cloud.png)

error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again.
error.invalid_sgtin_or_pin: Invalid SGTIN or PIN code, please try again.
error.timeout_button: Blue button press timeout, please try again.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: The duration of eco mode in minutes.

accesspoint_id.name: Accesspoint ID
accesspoint_id.description: The ID of the Homematic IP Access Point.

endtime.name: Endtime
endtime.description: The time when the eco mode should automatically be disabled.

activate_vacation.name: Activate vacation
activate_vacation.description: Activates the vacation mode until the given time.

endtime.name: [%key:component::homematicip_cloud::services::activate_eco_mode_with_period::fields::endtime::name%]
endtime.description: The time when the vacation mode should automatically be disabled.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The set temperature during the vacation mode.

set_active_climate_profile.name: Set active climate profile
set_active_climate_profile.description: Sets the active climate profile index.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The ID of the climate entity. Use 'all' keyword to switch the profile for all entities.

climate_profile_index.name: Climate profile index
climate_profile_index.description: The index of the climate profile.

dump_hap_config.name: Dump hap config
dump_hap_config.description: Dumps the configuration of the Homematic IP Access Point(s).

config_output_path.name: Config output path
config_output_path.description: (Default is 'Your home-assistant config directory') Path where to store the config.

config_output_file_prefix.name: Config output file prefix
config_output_file_prefix.description: Name of the config file. The SGTIN of the AP will always be appended.

reset_energy_counter.name: Reset energy counter
reset_energy_counter.description: Resets the energy counter of a measuring entity.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The ID of the measuring entity. Use 'all' keyword to reset all energy counters.
